name: Trickstar Bloody Mary
desc:
Link Arrows: [🡷] [🡲]

2 "Trickstar" monsters
Each time a “Trickstar” monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to a zone this card points to, you gain 200 LP. You can discard 1 “Trickstar” card; each player draws 1 card. If your LP is 2000 or more higher than your opponent’s LP, you draw 2 cards instead. You can only activate this effect of "Trickstar Bloody Mary" once per turn.
